availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Catharina Koch Kolb (Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Germany. Married to Conrad Kolb in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in October 1852. Mother of Cath Kolb, Mary Kolb, Kate Kolb, George Kolb, Peter Kolb, William Kolb, John Kolb, and Lillie Kolb. Resident in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/Ward 3, p. 649.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/Ward 4, p. 421A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000588548, p. 239.
"Catharina Kolb (1828-1866)," Find A Grave, Memorial #127428758, accessed May 25, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/127428758.
